text: The Pentax Optio H90 is a digital compact camera announced by Pentax on January 25, 2010. It was launched under a new "functional beauty" design paradigm and was described as exhibiting "pleasant minimalism".http://www.dpreview.com/articles/4610888346/pentaxoptioh90 It is compatible with Eye-Fi wireless SD cards and supports 720p video. ==References== *http://www.dpreview.com/products/pentax/compacts/pentax_optioh90/specifications Category:Pentax cameras Category:Cameras introduced in 2010
title: Pentax Optio H90
